SEARCH
Package model.Components

Class ComponentAdd

java.lang.Object
model.Components.AlgorithmComponent
model.Components.ComponentAdd
public class ComponentAdd extends AlgorithmComponent

This class represents the add component. This component is added and initialized whenever a ComponentWhile or a ComponentIf is being added to the algorithm by the user

This component is graphically added at the end of the ComponentWhile loop, and at the junction of the two branches of the ComponentIf

    • printCode

      public ArrayList<Line> printCode(String language)
      Description copied from class: AlgorithmComponent

      This method will be called from every instance of any class that extends this class

      This method needs to be overrided by the single child classes for proper functionality and it will translate the informations contained in the instances to different programming languages such as Python, Java and PseudoCode

      Overrides:
      printCode in class AlgorithmComponent
      Parameters:
      language - The language that it needs to be translated in

      Possible values:

      • "Python"
      • "Java"
      • "PseudoCode"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Lines, with all the lines of code generated for the language
